alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:24AM CST until January 29 at 6:35AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River near Goodrich affecting Polk, Liberty and San Jacinto Counties. Trinity River near Moss Bluff affecting Chambers and Liberty Counties. Trinity River at Liberty affecting Liberty County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Riverside affecting Polk, Walker, Trinity and San Jacinto Counties. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Goodrich. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 39.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 36.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Thursday was 39.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 44.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 44.3 feet on 05/29/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Trinity River Goodrich 36.0 39.1 Thu 9 am CST 44.0 40.2 38.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 430 AM CST.
